name: Grabbed
description:
Magnetize to move tiles around, and make a path to the exit.

But be careful once two groups of tiles have touched they are joined together and it is impossible for them to be separated.

Controls:

WASD /arrow keys - movement

space - toggle magnetization

Due to limitations with the GODOT engine there can be up to 0.5 sec time delay of the audio, for best experience consider downloading the game.

Feedback is appreciated

Credit for sound efx:

https://freesound.org/people/JavierZumer/sounds/257225/
